hero.title: pergolas crafted
hero.subtitle: Transform your outdoor space with bespoke pergolas designed with precision, built with passion, and crafted to stand the test of time.
hero.story: Every pergola tells a story of precision and passion

services.title: Our Services
services.heading: Crafting Excellence in
services.description: From initial concept to final installation, we provide comprehensive pergola solutions that transform your outdoor space into a masterpiece of design and functionality.

customDesign.title: Custom Design
customDesign.description: Bespoke pergola designs tailored to your space, style, and vision. Every project is unique and crafted with precision.

premiumMaterials.title: Premium Materials
premiumMaterials.description: Only the finest materials are used in our constructions. Weather-resistant, durable, and built to last generations.

expertInstallation.title: Expert Installation
expertInstallation.description: Professional installation by certified craftsmen with years of experience in outdoor construction and design.

lifetimeSupport.title: Lifetime Support
lifetimeSupport.description: Comprehensive warranty and ongoing support. We stand behind our work with dedicated customer service for life.

about.title: About
about.description: Crafting exceptional outdoor and indoor spaces with passion, precision, and years of expertise that transforms visions into reality.

journey.title: Our
journey.paragraph1: With over a decade of experience in architectural design and construction, Sivory Design has become synonymous with excellence in creating beautiful, functional outdoor and indoor spaces that exceed expectations.
journey.paragraph2: Our team of skilled craftsmen and designers work tirelessly to bring your vision to life, ensuring every project meets our high standards of quality, innovation, and aesthetic appeal.

about.quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude that we bring to every project, every detail, every moment.

qualityCraftsmanship.title: Quality Craftsmanship
qualityCraftsmanship.description: Every project is executed with meticulous attention to detail and premium materials.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously push boundaries to create unique, cutting-edge design solutions.

clientPartnership.title: Client Partnership
clientPartnership.description: Your vision guides our process, ensuring results that exceed your expectations.

contact.title: Start Your
contact.description: Ready to transform your space? Fill out the form below and let's bring your vision to life.

form.title: Send us a
form.name: Name
form.privacy: Your information is safe with us and will never be shared.
